The 2013 World Mixed Doubles Curling Championship was held from April 13 to 20 at the newly constructed Grant-Harvey Centre in Fredericton , New Brunswick . The event was held in conjunction with the 2013 World Senior Curling Championships . This event marked the first time that Canada has hosted a World Mixed Doubles Curling Championship since its inception in 2008. # Teams # The teams are listed as follows : # Round Robin Standings # ' ' Final Round Robin Standings ' ' table #
